title: China Lockdowns Are Bleak & Biden Can't Speak | Daily Best of April 8 | Rick & Bubba
description:
China Lockdowns Are Bleak & Biden Can't Speak | Daily Best of April 8 | Rick & Bubba

China is locked down as drones fly above cities with recorded messages commanding citizens to "comply with COVID restrictions. Control your soul’s desire for freedom." China also has a social credit score system to control citizens, which leads us to look at the ESG (Environmental, Social, and Corporate Governance) score that is driving the woke public relations campaigns from U.S. corporations trying to secure grants and government contracts. In other news, Tiger Woods has great day on the golf course. A pontoon boat gets crushed by a drawbridge in Florida. And lastly, Joe Biden awkwardly celebrates confirmation of Supreme Court Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson, then he screams absolute gibberish and receives thunderous applause from the Left.
Sponsor: Manscaped: Manscaped recently launched the ultimate men’s hygiene bundle – the Performance Package, including their precision-engineered tools! And you can join over 4 million men worldwide who trust Manscaped with this exclusive offer – you’ll get 20% off and free worldwide shipping with my code, “RICK20” at https://Manscaped.com. This Performance Package has it all. You get the Lawn Mower 4.0 trimmer, the Weed Whacker ear and nose hair trimmer, Crop Preserver deodorant for the air down there, Crop Reviver Toner, Performance Boxer Briefs, and a travel bag to hold all your goodies! Manscaped has revolutionized the field of self-care for men – their 4th generation trimmer features a cutting-edge ceramic blade to reduce grooming accidents; it’s all part of their Advanced SkinSafe Technology. AND it’s waterproof and includes a 400k LED spotlight, in case you need to get a little more precise with your shaving. Get 20% off and FREE SHIPPING with the code “RICK20” at https://Manscaped.com. Unlock your confidence and always use the right tools for the job with Manscaped!

content:encoded:
China Lockdowns Are Bleak & Biden Can't Speak | Daily Best of April 8 | Rick & Bubba


China is locked down as drones fly above cities with recorded messages commanding citizens to "comply with COVID restrictions. Control your soul’s desire for freedom." China also has a social credit score system to control citizens, which leads us to look at the ESG (Environmental, Social, and Corporate Governance) score that is driving the woke public relations campaigns from U.S. corporations trying to secure grants and government contracts. In other news, Tiger Woods has great day on the golf course. A pontoon boat gets crushed by a drawbridge in Florida. And lastly, Joe Biden awkwardly celebrates confirmation of Supreme Court Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson, then he screams absolute gibberish and receives thunderous applause from the Left.
